metadata.dc:author: Martín, G
Poncela, M
Morais, D
Alarcos, E
Blasco, M J
metadata.dc:description: A case report of pilomatrixoma, benign neoplasy, originated of the skin annexes, which localisation force us to rule out a parotid tumor. Our intention is to include the pilomatrixoma among the possible differential diagnosis of calcified masses inside the growths of the parotid gland.
metadata.dc:title: El pilomatrixoma en el diagnóstico diferencial de los tumores de la región parotídea.
[Pilomatrixoma and differential diagnosis of parotid area tumors].
